body.description: Really Natural. Really Works. Schmidt’s Sandalwood and Citrus is the first Ecocert Certified Natural Deodorant for women and men in the US — Formulated with certified 100 percent natural origin ingredients, natural deodorant without aluminum, certified vegan deodorant by Vegan Action and Leaping Bunny certified cruelty-free. Our natural deodorant formula helps neutralize odor and keep you fresh, enriched with magnesium, and offers all-day 24 hour odor protection while being gentle on skin. Schmidt’s is made with plant-based oils and butters like coconut oil, jojoba seed oil, and shea moisture butter, as well as vitamin E. Luxurious, long-lasting scents made with 100 percent natural origin fragrance are never synthetic, always made with plant isolates and essential oils like tea tree and lavender. All of our Schmidt’s natural deodorant sticks require only a small amount of application for great results. To use, hold the deodorant stick momentarily to skin to soften on contact with body heat. Gently apply a small amount to dry, clean underarms to keep you feeling fresh all day. 1-2 swipes for application are all you need. Do not apply to irritated, damaged or freshly shaved skin. Our vegan deodorant never contains aluminum salts, artificial fragrance, filler ingredients, propylene glycol, phthalates, or parabens.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Natural Deodorant that Actually Works Made with: Coconut oil provides a smooth feel, helps with skin nourishmentMagnesium Hydroxide for odor controlEssential Oils for a rich, luxurious aroma 2021 Our Natural Deodorants never contain Aluminum SaltsArtifical FragranceFiller IngredientsParabensPropylene GlycolPhthalates 2021 100% Vegan Regardless of scent or formula, all of our products are 100% vegan 2021 Cruelty - Free We're Leaping Bunny certified Cruelty-Free and proud to say we never test our products on animals. 2021

Our Signature Formula Help neutralize odor and keep you fresh, naturally. Enriched with natural magnesium24 hour protectionInnovative ingredients derived from plants and mineralsAmazing natural scents with essential oils, like bergamot, lavender, and roseHold to skin for a few seconds before swiping a little goes a long way. Our Sensitive Skin Formula Smooth and creamy in texture, formulated for those with baking soda sensitivities. Enriched with natural magnesium24 hour protectionFree of baking sodaAmazing natural scents with essential oils, like jasmine, coconut, and tea treeHold to skin for a few seconds before swiping a little goes a long way. Our Hemp Formula An elevated take on our Sensitive Skin formula packed with hemp seed oil. Omega and vitamin richFree of baking sodaContains no CBD and no THC24 hour protectionAmazing natural scents with essential oils, like patchouli, sage, and rose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Still works and smells good
reviews.reviewText: I really like this brand, the sticks are a bit smaller but so are many things. I used to love a scent they no longer made, but this one is good. I do not like all of them the same, but this one is good and seems to work well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A nice change after many years of charcoal and other types of deodorant
reviews.reviewText: A super nice and delicate scent. Keeps me dry and fresh all throughout the day and evening. I have used charcoal based deodorant for many years and was afraid to try something new. I still use my charcoal (happily) and am grateful to have another scent that works just as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great deodorant, do your research to get the right scent for you
reviews.reviewText: I love this brand of deodorant but be aware that the Sandalwood & Citrus scent is closer to scents usually marketed to men. I had to return this scent to get a more feminine smelling scent, just my personal preference. However the quality of the deodorant is such that it applies well to the skin, does not irritate my skin (although I don’t have sensitive skin), and it prevents odor from accumulation of sweat throughout the day. It’s well worth the money to buy this brand because it gets the job done and they have scents that will appeal to almost anyone. If you have sensitive skin you may want to do some research before buying as baking soda can be harsh. For non sensitive skin, which can also break out from baking soda, it is less likely you will have any issue as they have many ingredients that will reduce the harshness of the baking soda while maintaining odor-blocking effectiveness. I have tried Crystal deodorants, Pit Liquor spray and even handmade so I can avoid aluminum deodorants, but this is the best for my money as it is extremely effective and a little goes a long way.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars $10 deoderant... but worth it
reviews.reviewText: I hate spending $10 on deodorant. I've spent up to $20 and never felt like it was doing anything. I usually just buy on sale from the grocery store... till now.First, the cons. These don't last nearly as long as the big-name brand in-store versions. When I apply it, I have to hold it against my armpit for a 5-count just to make sure it's heated up enough to apply. As someone who's been using deodorant for 35 years now, this was off-putting at first. Oh! and your armpits will feel wet for a minute after putting on.After saying all that, I've subscribe/saved to this stuff. I'm trying to get away from the aluminum stuff I've been using all my life. Even though aluminum deodorants keep me drier, I still get stains in my shirts and my armpits smell at the end of the day. When the big deodorants do last, the scent is more like a 13-year-old trying cologne for the first time. For the minor inconveniences in application, it's worth it.This scent... citrus/sandalwood. I love it. I first tried the magnesium and charcoal. Scent was fine, but I didn't love it enough to keep buying it. Then I tried sandalwood/citrus. It just works for me. Maybe the others work for you. Because this stuff seems to be heat-activated, the more active I am, the better I smell; a complete 180 to my previous deodorants. Two days is too long, but when I put this on in the morning, it lasts till I wake up the next day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Natural Deodorant
reviews.reviewText: Great natural deo that doesn’t irritate sensitive skin. Nice scent. Doesn’t stain clothes. If the dial is sticking (& it probably will when you first use the stick) set it down & then try again 10min later, it seems to work fine then. Still, a little annoying. 5 stars nonetheless!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Natural Deodorant
reviews.reviewText: This was a new scent for me. It works well and didn’t irritate my skin. I will buy it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love the smell. It keeps me fresh for the entire day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: We've been through a number of deodorants and this one seems to be doing the best job and it doesn't set off my husband's armpits like the other do. He always has a reactions eventually... And he gets swollen lymphs with other brands which he doesn't with this one so we're going to stick with this

reviews.reviewerName: It's same as the picture, perfect
